wikipedia_page.main: Jay Hambro (born 1975) is a British businessman in the mining, energy, steel and commodity sectors. He is the chief investment officer of the GFG Alliance, but is expected to be leaving as of July 2021.

response: *Jay Hambro, British businessman known for being the chief executive officer of Aricom

K&S is a magnetite project that is currently in the development stage. The K&S Mine is located in the Jewish Autonomous Region (JAO) of the Russian Far East. It is currently in the development stage. At the end of June 2014, the project was estimated to be 78% complete, and commissioning targeted December 2014.IRC 2014 Interim Report, 21 August 2014, p.7  In an interview with Bloomberg on 1 August 2014, the Executive Chairman of IRC Jay Hambro called the K&S project a "Game Changer" for IRC.http://www.businessweek.com/videos/2014-08-20/k-and-s-project-a-game-changer-for-irc-hambro
* Jay Hambro – CIO of Petropavlovsk plc; CEO of Aricom
